Uses of Class
timeSeries.Observation

Packages that use Observation
Package
Description
arima
The arima package contains the AR and the ARMA class.
heuristik
The heuristik package contains the brute force method for the ARMA p,q order.
timeSeries
The timeSeries package contains the Observation and the TimeSeriesUtils class.
